definition: people who have been introduced to the mysteries of some field or activity, set in motion, start an event or prepare the way for
details:
noun
- people who have been introduced to the mysteries of some field or activity
= example: people who have been introduced to the mysteries of some field or activity
= synonyms: enlightened
- someone who has been admitted to membership in a scholarly field
= synonyms: learned person, pundit, savant
- someone new to a field or activity
= synonyms: beginner, novice
verb
- set in motion, start an event or prepare the way for
= synonyms: lead up
- bring up a topic for discussion
= synonyms: broach
- bring into being
= example: bring into being
= synonyms: start
- take the lead or initiative in
= synonyms: pioneer
- accept people into an exclusive society or group, usually with some rite
= example: accept people into an exclusive society or group, usually with some rite
= synonyms: induct
